name: xwas
body: ### An R package for X-Wide Association Analyses Introduction here. ### Quickstart - Users From CRAN. ``` # Not viable, we are currently working on a submission to CRAN. install.packages("xwas") ``` Using the source from Github. ``` # This installs devtools package, if not already installed > install.packages("devtools") # This loads devtools > library(devtools) # This downloads the latest xwas production package from Github > install_github('chiragjp/xwas') # This downloads the latest xwas development package from Github > install_github('nampho2/xwas') > library(xwas) ``` ### Quickstart - Contributors ``` $ git clone git@github.com:nampho2/xwas.git $ make deploy $ R > library(xwas) ``` ### Support or Contact The xwas package was originally authored by @chiragjp and currently maintained by @nampho2. Please e-mail the current package maintainer with any questions. ### References 1. asdf 2. asdf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
